data.title: Film Director Abel Gance in his later years Stock Photo
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: Film Director Abel Gance in his later years - E0YM92 from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
data.text:
This image could have imperfections as it’s either historical or reportage.

Jan. 1, 1970 - Paris, France - One of the most important figures of cinema as an art ABEL GANCE revolutionized film technology with a masterful mix of real-time editing and rapid cutting, a technique he invented. The Father of Surrealism, Gance earned international recognition in 1919 for his three hour epic J'Accuse, a powerful anti-war film which included location filming of battles. (Credit Image: © KEYSTONE Pictures USA)
